body.p:
To his Excellency
B Magoffin Gov. of Ky

The undersigned respectfully states that he was fined at the last term of the Kenton Circuit Court he was fined $50- for illegal voting and states that he has resided in the city of covington 13 years and has been a voter there most of that time and has been a law abiding citizen and having been in the habit of voting at all city Elections at the city Hall the precinct for voting in his ward at the last August Election the same being a state Election he went to thise city Hall as at City Election not thinking or Knowing of the precinct arrangment for state Elections and voted there instead of at another preinct in his district. And states that he was a good voter in the same district but not at the precinct where he voted That he did not vote illegally Knowingly or with any wrong intention. He prays your Excellency to remit so much of the fine above named as your Excellency has controll over as in duty he will ever pray --
The statements of the above petition are substantially true and we hope your Excellency will grant the prayer thereof

S A Cambron
W D Holt
John R. Ricke
W. O. Hoskins

Petition of John McAnder for remission of fine
Kenton Cir Ct
Remitted
B. M
$50 } Illegal voting
Issd Feby 15 1861
